$95 million donated to Red Cross Bushfire fund BUT “some of the funds would be saved to spend towards disasters in the future“. People didn’t donate so the Red Cross could bank. There are people living in tents who’ve lost homes and whole communities in distress. Spend the money.

🇦🇺 Open d'Australie - #bushfires 

Pour la durée du tournoi, nous rejoignons le mouvement d'aide pour l'Australie.
Nous reverserons 5$ par double faute de @benoitpaire et 20$ par raquette brisée.

L'argent ira à la @RedCrossAU.
Bon Open d'Australie à tous! https://t.co/4Ti9b7JvIs

Thank you to the @sixers org for helping us support @RedCrossAU and their Australian bushfire relief efforts through this @Prizeo campaign: https://t.co/vELr769rZP

Donate to a very worthy cause and have chance to win exclusive @sixers experiences and prizes. 🇦🇺 https://t.co/SWmp8wxyzt

I’m doing a meet and greet with Carlos to support the @F1 Australian bushfire appeal.

You’ll get a couple of VIP passes and the opportunity to see our lovely faces.

All proceedes go to @RedCrossAU, @CFA_Updates, @FRRR_Oz & @WWF_Australia 👊🏼

https://t.co/ruXm2TLyB6

Who knew, when donating to the #RedCross for the #bushfires that they had never "committed" to pass it all on and did not intend to? Concurrently they still have not repaid $20m of their staff wages underpayments discovered and announced in mid 2018.
WE WERE CONNED! #NeverAgain

Win the ultimate 76ers experience! You & a guest will be flown to Philly & participate in the Captains’ huddle, enjoy 2 tickets to the game & more! Your entries will support @RedCrossAU which has been providing aid to those affected by the Bushfires. https://t.co/hYXzirozNa RT! https://t.co/3I48IePWWM

💠ANNOUNCEMENT💠

We are now offering reprints of the Community Art Calendar due to high demands!

ALL proceeds will be going to the Australian Red Cross to help aid against the devastating bushfires

Shop closes February 5th. Get yours now!

https://t.co/mzLJPLzSr6

Big day today with the big appeal underway for the bushfire victims and recovery efforts. Log onto 
https://t.co/rkCJTzjTCQ  to find out more and make a donation. 
All funds raised  will go to the Australian Red Cross Disaster Relief and Recovery Fund. 
#BigAppeal https://t.co/CTj5uK4XS1

I drew this piece for Procreate’s Australia fires fundraiser! All profits will be going to 2 charities: The Red Cross Bushfire Appeal, and the Australia Zoo Wildlife Warriors. Buy a print here: https://t.co/G20MHgpFBh

#ArtistsForFireRelief https://t.co/UhKWFHq7N8

My concern about where all these funds are going from the Fire Concert performed in Sydney is;

Funds raised will be split between the RFS, RSPCA, and Mr Dutton's Red Cross Disaster Relief Fund and Management...the latter is as I understand it a Fund set up for future disasters.
Red Cross to give only a third of $95m in donations to bushfire victims https://t.co/KDZ2tp6JWV

The Australian Red Cross says more than $61 million will be available for immediate relief as the charity doubles its funding for bushfire victims in the wake of criticism over slow donation distribution. 

https://t.co/n04B1sum5R

Team Williams takes on Team Wozniacki tonight at Rod Laver Arena for #Rally4Relief, raising funds for bushfire relief and recovery.

Thank you to everyone who's already donated to the #Aces4BushfireRelief campaign.

To contribute: https://t.co/vFbJBklQqq https://t.co/hdSFza3S7A

Today we have launched a charity collection on all our flights for the Australian Red Cross, who are helping people affected by the devastating bushfires in Australia 🇦🇺. We would like to thank our customers in advance for any donations and for their generosity ❤️. https://t.co/NHIzPx6aGx

We are raising money to help those in need that are affected by the horrific Australian bush fires. 
We are giving away a signed test press of Dogrel (only 3 made). To enter we are asking for a £5 donation to the Australian Red Cross via the link below. https://t.co/kmx9m0qjUU https://t.co/hMXSA5l3us

The Australian Red Cross owed $20m to current and former employees, is still paying this back, and hasn't joined the National Redress Scheme for child abuse survivors. When I asked, they said they are reconsidering. #bushfires https://t.co/LnMMRgEr63 https://t.co/UqGPIb6zPG
The Australian Red Cross is doubling its funds to help people affected by bushfires with the charity saying more than $61 million will now be available as immediate relief. https://t.co/7Cye7L2FF1

Due to high demands, we're looking into doing a 2nd round of preorders for the calendars. Another charity run so all proceeds will go to the Australian Red Cross in their efforts against the bushfire battles. Once everything is organized, we'll make another announcement💕 https://t.co/xpdhIqIDqd

Our Bushfire Advisory Panel met this week. From Monday we'll start distributing new financial assistance. This weekend we're getting systems and teams ready to make it as easy as possible for ppl to access this additional help. https://t.co/isB82aPj3l

#PrayForAustralia

Can’t wait to come to Australia and New Zealand this month! Were going to have donation stations at every show for @RSPCA and @RedCrossAU to support bushfire relief efforts. If you’re outside of AUS/NZ, you can donate at https://t.co/gkq20seYTp or https://t.co/e5i1RYAp1Y

Just heard from a teacher in Canada who enquired about the royalties to perform one of my plays. I asked that they instead donate to a #bushfirecrisis relief fund and they are donating to the Canadian Red Cross' Australian Bushfire Relief fund. So happy. 😌

I am now the Proud owner of a signed 1989 Balmain Tigers jersey. I won it at auction with all proceeds going to the Red Cross bushfires disaster fund. Thanks to Steve Russo @russos1991 for the donation of a loved jersey. I will look after it. https://t.co/7fjdQ5qVeA

Hey @RedCrossAU.... I just heard that you all are only donating $30 million of the $95 million donated to help the bush fire situation. If so.... how is that possible? Word to the wise: please give to charity. Do NOT give it to the Red Cross. Shame on you #RedCross. 👎

After the Red Cross copped alot of criticism for how it was spending bushfire donations Tim Costello has shed light on how charities operate.

https://t.co/wIhavOICKo

#milliners4recovery Belle Folie is auctioning this black  open weave sun hat size is adjustable 55 to 56.5 cm . 100% of your bid will go to Red Cross Australia bushfire appeal  to help with recovery efforts. Hat auction ending 21st Jan at 5pm EST https://t.co/hxVUXo5332

The family of a man with terminal cancer has told how he spent days in agony fleeing bushfires, before initially being denied financial assistance from the Red Cross. #9News 
https://t.co/wa7jaY5MBg

DARNA DID IT AGAIN. Ms. @143redangel personally went to our Philippine Red Cross-Batangas Chapter to donate and volunteer in the distribution of relief goods and hygiene kits to the families affected by the eruption of Taal volcano.

“I didn’t know what to do until I came here but then Red Cross grabbed me, put me under their wing and away I went.”

VERY misleading headline. $11mil will be allocated to admin costs, but they raised $115mil. $11mil is still under 10% of the funds raised which is about average for most charities. This seems like a nothing burger. Also getting funds to people in these

Every day, our #bushfire grants team gets more than a million dollars out the door to people who need immediate assistance. This article explains what it takes to pay each one of those #grants

Read here 👉 https://t.co/wCaVxR7hAa https://t.co/64a6qQeMm5
